授業目的: This course stresses Japan’s financial system with a particular reference to corporate finance. We will study the features of Japan’s financial system, financial institutions and financial markets to ensuring effective financial intermediation as well as robustness in the financial system. We will review the functions of the Tokyo Stock Exchange, Bank of Japan, Financial Services Agency, and the banking system for the efficient deployment of funds to entrepreneurs. Finally, the course will shed light on the determination of interest rates, time value of money and Japan’s foreign exchange transactions
到達目標: After completing the course, students will learn the features of Japanese financial system, financial institutions, financial markets, and financial instruments in providing finance to corporations. TThe course is useful for the advanced electives in corporate finance and financial management courses, in particular.
